text: Andrew N. Ferguson is an American lawyer and Republican politician who has been the Chair of the Federal Trade Commission since 2025. He has been a commissioner of the Federal Trade Commission since 2024. He was the solicitor general of Virginia from 2022 to 2024."PN799 — Andrew N. Ferguson — Federal Trade Commission" United States Senate, March 7, 2024 In December 2024, President-elect Donald Trump nominated Ferguson to be the Chair of the Federal Trade Commission. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Lawyers from Virginia
title: Andrew N. Ferguson
